title: How Capitalism Helped Ruin The Familyâ„¢
description:

Parents, Children, Romance, Partners, Capital, Wealth, Inheritance - Family. The topic itself is incredibly fascinating - I hope you enjoy my overview and critique of it. It's something everyone should know at least a little bit about. There's no aspect of our lives that Capitalism doesn't touch.  A spiritual successor of the Relationships video.

We've got a new look going. I'm still editing my videos, but I paid for some new editing software which helps a lot. All of it thanks to the patrons.

title: Nazi Race Propaganda | Would you survive?
description:
Listen to the podcast on your preferred platform from the list here: https://www.buzzsprout.com/1890340
Get Episodes early and bonus content by supporting the podcast: https://www.patreon.com/TheDeprogram
Podcast on Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/thedeprogram

Support The Channel Through Paypal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/yugopnik
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/PD7P6hQA6S
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/yugopnik

Video was made based on information gathered in the following books. Many of the concepts have been simplified for practical viewing reasons. The jury is still out on many Nazi race theories because, ironically, they were rarely set in stone - something I argue is for a reason.

Books:
- The racial state  by Michael Burleigh
-  Toward the Final Solution: A History of European Racism
Book by George Mosse
- Excerpts from Mein Kampf (do not waste your time reading this, please)
- Great Talk on the topic if you don't feel like reading too much but would like to know more: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ld5q9p1zHZw&t=2411s

title: Aesthetics of Evil - The Nazi Salute
description:
Consider supporting the channel over on Patreon and Paypal. Thank you.
Support The Channel on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/yugopnik
Support The Channel Through Paypal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/yugopnik
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/PD7P6hQA6S
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/yugopnik

We take a deep dive into the meaning of social contact, the way we greet and communicate, how ideology influences norms, and a less talked about but incredibly important analysis of how reactionaries transform our very understanding of normalcy. It's history mixed with sociology time!

Main Source:
- The Hitler salute - the meaning of a gesture. Allert Tilman.

title: Why are Americans so afraid of Socialism? The Red Scare analyzed.
description:
To support this Channel please check out:
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/yugopnik

Check out the editor/Animator Volksgeist : http://youtube.com/volksgeist and http://volksgeist.org 

Paypal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/yugopnik
Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCs8mbJ-M142ZskR5VR0gBig/join
Come have a laugh with me on the Twitter hellscapes: https://twitter.com/yugopnik
Discord coming soon.

I do not own any rights to the historic material depicted in this video.

Sources/Inspirations:

https://www.jacobinmag.com/2020/05/mccarthyism-red-scare-civil-rights-movement
https://library.oapen.org/bitstream/id/9f53c82c-1d01-4eb3-a6a7-23520f025099/342368.pdf
https://www.amazon.com/Red-Scare-Memories-American-Inquisition/dp/0393335046
https://www.history.com/topics/cold-war/red-scare
https://millercenter.org/the-presidency/educational-resources/age-of-eisenhower/mcarthyism-red-scare
https://www.mtsu.edu/first-amendment/article/1063/red-scare
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZBYdkjcmeMM
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/07/20/us/politics/china-red-scare-washington.html
The WIKI is good: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Red_Scare 
https://www.writing.upenn.edu/~afilreis/50s/schrecker-legacy.html
https://progressive.org/dispatches/mccarthyism-now-stockwell-170103/
Leftist newspaper about the era and its influence today:
https://www.currentaffairs.org/2016/11/syria-and-the-reemergence-of-mccarthyism

title: Aesthetics of Evil  - The Fascist uniform.
description:
To support this Channel please check out:
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/yugopnik
Paypal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/yugopnik

Come have a laugh with me on the Twitter hellscapes: https://twitter.com/yugopnik
Discord coming soon.

Sources, and yes, I prefer them to be easy to understand instead of using academic formats - not everyone here had the privilege of getting a college degree:

- Framework and broader idea come from reading "Dressing the Reich: The Fear and Elegance in Nazi Uniforms"
- Defeated Nazi General quote - The Things Our Fathers Saw: The Untold Stories of the World War II Generation
- The US vs Nazi uniform quote - Klemperer, Victor. I Will Bear Witness
- Himmler talking about the SS uniform- https://military.wikia.org/wiki/Uniforms_and_insignia_of_the_Schutzstaffel 
original source checked and confirmed in The Third Reich: A New History". 2001. p. 192
- Sketches of uniforms from the Organisationsbuch der NSDAP - hard to find on "legit" websites.
- Goebbels quote on uniformity: One of the Reich Chamber of Culture's slogans
- Umberto Eco - Ur-Fascism (READ THIS PLEASE)
- Rommel and Fortune photo - after the fall of the 51st Division to the Nazis 12 June 1940

The fictional video used is of John in "Man in the High Castle".
The ending shot is from the movie "Come and See".
I do not own any of these materials in any shape or form.

title: Is it hypocritical for leftist Youtubers to make lots of money? The morality of wealth accumulation.
description:
Support me, druÅ¾e: https://www.patreon.com/yugopnik
Twitter: https://twitter.com/yugopnik
Donate at: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme2/yugopnik

Today we discuss a taboo subject. Even though the answers are obvious - the conversation itself is not.

Inspiration sources:
1) https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2018/apr/25/can-you-be-socialist-and-rich-google
Well, yes. In a way, asking if one can be a socialist and rich is like asking whether a woman can be a feminist and a stay-at-home mum. Believing in a political or social value does not mean living your life like a monk, dedicating every minute to the cause.Â 

2) https://chomsky.info/20051031/
Chomsky gets angry 

3) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3wfNl2L0Gf8#t=3953
Chomsky gets very angry

4) The capitalists will sell us the rope with which we shall hang them!

title: How consumerism presents itself as activism. Does watching leftist YT contribute to anything?
description:
Support me: https://www.patreon.com/yugopnik
Twitter: https://twitter.com/yugopnik

Are you really contributing to anything by consuming hours and hours of leftist online content? Is there such a thing as ethical consumption under capitalism? 
In my new video coming soon, we tackle how consumerism camouflages itself as activism.

title: The Last Acceptable Bad Guy Sterotype - "Evil Slavs"
description:
Support me: https://www.patreon.com/yugopnik
Follow me on Twitter - https://twitter.com/yugopnik
This topic is very close to my heart, as It's never really talked about.
Even though I've considered myself a "Citizen of the World" the particular misrepresentation of my own culture has always cut deep.

This though does not mean I endorse "cultural representation" in modern media as a simple profit source. In this critique I look at the intent behind creating diverse media - instead of diverse media itself.
